questions.question: Which of the following FME Workbench features is not commonly used in a production environment?
It is best practice to remove all Loggers and Inspectors not used for error trapping or reporting before moving a workspace into production.
Feature caching being enabled or disabled is a setting stored at the workspace level.
Why should you remove disabled sections of your workspace before putting it into production?
options: Leaving disabled sections will be confusing to future users and clutters your workspace.
Leaving disabled sections will significantly negatively impact performance
Leaving disabled sections will cause errors from your workspace while it is in production.
Leaving disabled sections will prevent your workspace from running on FME Server.
